TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TraceContextRecord extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET 跟踪消息和任何关联数据。

span.span: Represents an ASP.NET trace message and any associated data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象将封装跟踪消息、 类别、 任何相关联，以及是否通过写入跟踪记录方法。The object encapsulates the trace message, category, any associated , and whether the trace record was written by the method. 每次调用并方法将生成添加到对象消息集合。Every call to the and methods generates a object that is added to the messages collection. 可以通过处理访问的记录集合事件。You can access the collection of records by handling the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何注册委托来处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how you can register a delegate to handle the event. 在此示例中，`OnTraceFinished`方法访问的集合对象通过属性，循环访问它们，并将其写入到响应流。In this example, the `OnTraceFinished` method accesses the collection of objects through the property, iterates through them, and writes them to the response stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/CS/form3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/VB/form3vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次调用并方法将生成添加到对象消息集合。Every call to the and methods generates a object that is added to the messages collection. 方法调用设置属性设置为`true`，而方法调用将其设置为`false`。The method call sets the property to `true`, while the method calls set it to `false`.

summary.span: 获取跟踪记录的用户定义的类别。

span.span: Gets the user-defined category for the trace record.

value.span: 表示跟踪记录的类别的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents a category for the trace record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类别用于更好地将跟踪消息组织成可识别的组，但可以是任意字符串。The category is used to better organize trace messages into recognizable groups, but can be any string. 类使用作为方法只能接受其默认类别`message`参数。The class uses as its default category for methods that take only a `message` parameter. ASP.NET 中，将多个跟踪记录写入启用跟踪时，默认类别是"aspx.page"。The default category for ASP.NET, which writes several trace records when tracing is enabled, is "aspx.page". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问的属性，并打印它，并为其关联的跟踪消息`Response`流。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property of a , and print it and its associated trace message to the `Response` stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_5/CS/form5cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_5/VB/form5vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A associated with the trace record, if one exists, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果正使用跟踪来调试应用程序或进行故障排除错误和异常处理，可以在跟踪记录包含异常。You can include an exception in a trace record if you are using tracing to debug an application or troubleshoot error and exception handling. 属性是`null`跟踪记录时与之一相关联方法没有显式`errorInfo`提供参数或没有异常。The property is `null` when the trace record is associated with one of the methods that does not have an explicit `errorInfo` parameter or no exception is provided.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何检查的属性以确定是否已写入该记录包含消息或方法调用。The following code example demonstrates how to check the property of a to determine whether the message that the record contains was written by a or method call. 如果跟踪记录一条警告消息，不是一条错误消息采取不同的操作。If the trace record is a warning message, a different action is taken than if it is an error message. summary.span: 获取用户定义的跟踪消息。

span.span: Gets the user-defined trace message.

value.span: 表示跟踪记录的消息的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents a message for the trace record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息可以是任意字符串，用于写入详细的跟踪信息。The message can be any string, and is used to write detailed tracing information. 它对应于消息参数传递给和方法。It corresponds to the message parameter that is passed to the and methods. 可以运行时的值，消息方向，并指导你完成程序的执行或其他诊断数据的信息。The information can be run-time values, messages to orient you and guide you through a program's execution, or other diagnostic data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问的属性，并将其打印到`Response`流。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property of a , and print it to the `Response` stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_4/CS/form4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_4/VB/form4vb.aspx#1)]
